text:
doc/gen_rst.py  badly needs to be cleaned up. Problems include:
- Non pep*
- Ubiquitous references to scikit learn (change to nilearn)
- unsed variables in functions (time_m, time_s, short_name, etc.)
title: gen/gen_rst.py needs thorough cleanup

text: The kind of secret everybody is aware of ... The future of gen_rst.py is [sphinx-gallery](https://github.com/sphinx-gallery/sphinx-gallery). I would encourage you to follow its developments, maybe wait until it matures a bit, and forward your concerns there.
OK, are you saying "sphinx-gallery" will save us from the trailing "scikit learn references" and unused variables in the doc generation engine ? Great, I'm looking forward to that!
BTW, I'd have left the issue open, just to keep track (maybe with a different label). With the issue closed, we'll definitively loose track of the problem.
